climbs.name: Riding the Tongue, variation on One No-Trump
climbs.fa: One No-Trump: B Gillett 2002, Riding...: Ross & George

content.description:
Below the diagonal, left-leaning (LL) crack, go up 15' in a weakness with gear, then traverse right to gain LL crack, and follow it under & past bulge. At a wide pod of crack, place #3 Camalot, and break right & over bulge, then run-it-out on moderate rock to the ledge below the tongue with bolts.

Continue up namesake tongue with a few tricky moves to rappel station.
content.location:
20' right of

Parade of Fools

, we traversed in from left to gain the crack on Hidden Pleasures.

One No-Trump starts further right 20' along the margin of the cliff.

content.description: Parade of Fools is a great route of face climbing that will leave you wanting more like the 10c just to the left. This is sustained.
content.protection: 10 bolts, one #1 Camalot, & wired nuts. Rap the route on a 70m, it just makes it.
content.location: Start about the middle of the face near a broken rock at base. The big tree will not be standing much longer.

content.description: Climb the crack "formed by stacked boulders" as described in Gillett's guidebook, then scramble to the small roof and follow the line of bolts along the edge of the slab to the anchors.  Rap to the ground.
content.protection: A few small and mid-sized cams and a few stoppers.

content.description: Climb the obvious crack that angles from the lower right to the upper left of the formation.  Surmounting he roof with the tree about mid-route is interesting. We considered the tree to be "on". This route had some harder-than-it-looked climbing - finger traversy and smeary stuff.

A moderate start protected with wires leads to short runout and ledge. Place small cams from the ledge, then with great care, go up a left-facing corner to clip the second bolt. The move to clip this beefy bolt is reasonable, but a fall here would be bad.

Work through a sequence of 5.10 cruxes clipping beefy bolts along the way. After the difficulties, follow the fat crack left to tree and belay.

Traverse up and right to reach rappel station on

One No-Trump

, skip the station on

Parade of Fools

.
content.protection: 6 bolts/fixed pin + small wires or small gear + #3 & #3.5 Camalot for the exit.
content.location: It is 10' uphill from huge, dead tree.

pathTokens: South Fork of St. Vrain Canyon
